short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds prefix to ExpandShare tabs. ('local - ', etc.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds environment prefixes to the title of ExpandShare tabs.

Since each environment displays the same title by default ("ExpandShare"), it can be confusing to switch tabs if you have multiple environments running at the same time. This extension makes it easy to differentiate environments by adding a small prefix to each tab's title.

Moving this to an extension instead of storing it in the site's source code ensures this is an opt-in setting. Customers who haven't installed this extension will see the default "ExpandShare" title on all versions of the site, while developers, testers, and other interested parties can install this extension to assist their work.

Current available prefixes: "local - ", "dev - ", "branch - ", "prod - "
